mapper.select: SELECT * from image_number a LEFT JOIN image_config b on a.image_id = b.id where a.image_id = #{id}
SELECT COALESCE(a.number,1)num,b.name,b.id from image_number a RIGHT JOIN image_config b on a.image_config_id = b.id where (a.image_id = #{id} or a.image_id is null) and b.type = 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image_number ( image_id, image_config_id, number ) VALUES( #{imageId}, #{imageConfigId}, #{number} )
